languages.text: "Не договориться с тем, кто ведает лишь черную горечь ненависти. Проклятье Вульфена — не только наш бич, но и щит против искуса. Когда невыносимые мысли гнездятся в разуме Волка, проклятье приходит и изгоняет их, затапливает водами гнева. С тем, кто стал Вульфеном, не договориться, его не обмануть и не прельстить. Это — наш кровавый оберег от зла".

"There is no reasoning with one who knows only the black bitterness of hatred. The Curse of the Wulfen is not only our bane but also our shield against temptation. When intolerable thoughts take shelter in a Wolf's mind, the curse comes and drives them out, dousing them with the waters of anger. You cannot reason with a Wulfen, or deceive him, or entice him. That is our bloody talisman against evil."
languages.original_text: "Не договориться с тем, кто ведает лишь черную горечь ненависти. Проклятье Вульфена — не только наш бич, но и щит против искуса. Когда невыносимые мысли гнездятся в разуме Волка, проклятье приходит и изгоняет их, затапливает водами гнева. С тем, кто стал Вульфеном, не договориться, его не обмануть и не прельстить. Это — наш кровавый оберег от зла".

traits.locale_text: "There is no reasoning with one who knows only the black bitterness of hatred. The Curse of the Wulfen is not only our bane but also our shield against temptation. When intolerable thoughts take shelter in a Wolf's mind, the curse comes and drives them out, dousing them with the waters of anger. You cannot reason with a Wulfen, or deceive him, or entice him. That is our bloody talisman against evil."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

When intolerable thoughts take shelter in a Wolf's mind, the curse comes and drives them out, dousing them with the waters of anger. You cannot reason with a Wulfen, or deceive him, or entice him. traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “他的心中充满了阴暗的仇恨，已经没办法再讲道理了。狼人诅咒并不仅仅是对我们的诅咒，也同样是我们抵御诱惑的盔甲。当无法克制的念头浮现在太空野狼的脑海中时，狼人诅咒就会降临，用愤怒的洪流浇熄这些念头。狼人是没有任何道理可讲的，他们不会被欺骗，也不会被引诱。这就是我们用来对抗邪恶的护身符，它流淌在我们的血脉之中。”
languages.original_text: "There is no reasoning with one who knows only the black bitterness of hatred. The Curse of the Wulfen is not only our bane but also our shield against temptation. When intolerable thoughts take shelter in a Wolf's mind, the curse comes and drives them out, dousing them with the waters of anger. You cannot reason with a Wulfen, or deceive him, or entice him. That is our bloody talisman against evil."

traits.locale_text: “他的心中充满了阴暗的仇恨，已经没办法再讲道理了。狼人诅咒并不仅仅是对我们的诅咒，也同样是我们抵御诱惑的盔甲。当无法克制的念头浮现在太空野狼的脑海中时，狼人诅咒就会降临，用愤怒的洪流浇熄这些念头。狼人是没有任何道理可讲的，他们不会被欺骗，也不会被引诱。这就是我们用来对抗邪恶的护身符，它流淌在我们的血脉之中。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「憎しみで満ちた黒い敵意しかない者に、理性などない。狂狼の呪いは俺たちにとって致命的というだけでなく、誘惑に対する障壁にもなってるんだ。許しがたい考えが狼の心にシェルターを築くと呪いがやってきて、怒りの水でずぶ濡れになるよう駆り立てる。ウルフェンに理を説くことはできない、欺くことも、気を引くことも。それこそ、俺たちの血が持つ魔除けなんだ」
languages.original_text: "There is no reasoning with one who knows only the black bitterness of hatred. The Curse of the Wulfen is not only our bane but also our shield against temptation. When intolerable thoughts take shelter in a Wolf's mind, the curse comes and drives them out, dousing them with the waters of anger. You cannot reason with a Wulfen, or deceive him, or entice him. That is our bloody talisman against evil."

traits.locale_text: 「憎しみで満ちた黒い敵意しかない者に、理性などない。狂狼の呪いは俺たちにとって致命的というだけでなく、誘惑に対する障壁にもなってるんだ。許しがたい考えが狼の心にシェルターを築くと呪いがやってきて、怒りの水でずぶ濡れになるよう駆り立てる。ウルフェンに理を説くことはできない、欺くことも、気を引くことも。それこそ、俺たちの血が持つ魔除けなんだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «No se puede razonar con quien solo conoce la negra amargura del odio. La Maldición de los Wulfen es nuestra perdición, pero también nuestro escudo contra la tentación. Cuando los pensamientos intolerables entran en la mente de un Lobo, la maldición los expulsa con las aguas de su ira. No se puede razonar con un Wulfen, ni engañarlo o tentarlo. Es nuestra sanguinaria protección contra el mal».
languages.original_text: "There is no reasoning with one who knows only the black bitterness of hatred. The Curse of the Wulfen is not only our bane but also our shield against temptation. When intolerable thoughts take shelter in a Wolf's mind, the curse comes and drives them out, dousing them with the waters of anger. You cannot reason with a Wulfen, or deceive him, or entice him. That is our bloody talisman against evil."

traits.locale_text: «No se puede razonar con quien solo conoce la negra amargura del odio. La Maldición de los Wulfen es nuestra perdición, pero también nuestro escudo contra la tentación. Cuando los pensamientos intolerables entran en la mente de un Lobo, la maldición los expulsa con las aguas de su ira. No se puede razonar con un Wulfen, ni engañarlo o tentarlo. Es nuestra sanguinaria protección contra el mal».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « On ne peut raisonner avec quelqu'un qui n'est plus animé que par la noire amertume de la haine. La Malédiction du Wulfen est à la fois la pire menace qui pèse sur nous et notre bouclier contre la tentation. Quand des pensées intolérables prennent racine dans l'esprit d'un Loup, la malédiction les noie sous les eaux de la colère. Nul ne peut calmer, tromper ou tenter un Wulfen. Tel est notre talisman sanglant contre le mal. »
languages.original_text: "There is no reasoning with one who knows only the black bitterness of hatred. The Curse of the Wulfen is not only our bane but also our shield against temptation. When intolerable thoughts take shelter in a Wolf's mind, the curse comes and drives them out, dousing them with the waters of anger. You cannot reason with a Wulfen, or deceive him, or entice him. That is our bloody talisman against evil."

traits.locale_text: « On ne peut raisonner avec quelqu'un qui n'est plus animé que par la noire amertume de la haine. La Malédiction du Wulfen est à la fois la pire menace qui pèse sur nous et notre bouclier contre la tentation. Quand des pensées intolérables prennent racine dans l'esprit d'un Loup, la malédiction les noie sous les eaux de la colère. Nul ne peut calmer, tromper ou tenter un Wulfen. Tel est notre talisman sanglant contre le mal. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Es gibt keine Vernunft bei jemandem, der nur die schwarze Bitternis des Hasses kennt. Der Fluch des Wulfen ist nicht nur unsere Geißel, sondern auch unser Schild gegen die Versuchung. Wenn nicht hinnehmbare Gedanken im Geist eines Wolfs auftauchen, kommt der Fluch und vertreibt sie, indem er sie mit den Wassern der Wut ertränkt. Ihr könnt mit einem Wulfen nicht vernünftig reden, ihn täuschen oder verlocken. Das ist unser blutiger Talisman gegen das Böse."
languages.original_text: "There is no reasoning with one who knows only the black bitterness of hatred. The Curse of the Wulfen is not only our bane but also our shield against temptation. When intolerable thoughts take shelter in a Wolf's mind, the curse comes and drives them out, dousing them with the waters of anger. You cannot reason with a Wulfen, or deceive him, or entice him. That is our bloody talisman against evil."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt keine Vernunft bei jemandem, der nur die schwarze Bitternis des Hasses kennt. Der Fluch des Wulfen ist nicht nur unsere Geißel, sondern auch unser Schild gegen die Versuchung. Wenn nicht hinnehmbare Gedanken im Geist eines Wolfs auftauchen, kommt der Fluch und vertreibt sie, indem er sie mit den Wassern der Wut ertränkt. Ihr könnt mit einem Wulfen nicht vernünftig reden, ihn täuschen oder verlocken. Das ist unser blutiger Talisman gegen das Böse."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Yalnızca öfkenin kara acısını bilen biriyle anlaşamazsın. Börü Laneti sadece felaketimiz değil, cazibeye karşı kalkanımızdır. Dayanılmaz düşünceler Kurt'un zihnine yerleşince lanet gelip onları kovar, öfke denizinde boğar. Börü'yle anlaşamazsın, onu kandıramazsın veya baştan çıkaramazsın. O, kötülüğe karşı kanlı nazarlığımızdır."
languages.original_text: "There is no reasoning with one who knows only the black bitterness of hatred. The Curse of the Wulfen is not only our bane but also our shield against temptation. When intolerable thoughts take shelter in a Wolf's mind, the curse comes and drives them out, dousing them with the waters of anger. You cannot reason with a Wulfen, or deceive him, or entice him. That is our bloody talisman against evil."

traits.locale_text: "Yalnızca öfkenin kara acısını bilen biriyle anlaşamazsın. Börü Laneti sadece felaketimiz değil cazibeye karşı kalkanımızdır. Dayanılmaz düşünceler bir Kurt'un zihnine yerleşince lanet gelip onları kovar, öfke denizinde boğar. Börü'yle anlaşamazsın, onu kandıramazsın veya baştan çıkaramazsın. O, kötülüğe karşı kanlı tılsımımızdır."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
